name: Luigi Villoresi
introduction: Luigi "Gigi" Villoresi ("DJEE-djee" VILL-or-ay-zee; May 16, 1909 in Milan, MI, Lombardy, Italy  August 24, 1997 in Modena, MO, Emilia-Romagna, Italy) was an Italian Grand Prix motor racing driver who continued racing on the Formula One circuit at the time of its inception. He spent his time in Grand Prix racing for Italian manufacturers Ferrari, Maserati and Lancia between 1950 and 1956.
